code: export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:'TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN'};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:'ADD_ITEM',payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:'REMOVE_ITEM',payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:'CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART',payload:item};};
